Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii


Rancor:

     Rancor began to pace, he was getting bored of standing around. "Weapons," He said to himself, randomly, "I like weapons," He did a quick diagnostic of his weapons systems and came up with his spider legs, which doubled as machine guns in robot mode, an double bladed axe attached to his back, and electrified "webs" that could spear a bot and be pulled back into the back of his wrists.

     "I need a name!" He said. He looked himself over, "Hmmm.....I can be.....Rancor!" He laughed his high pitched laughter, "Yes, I will be the venom that kills Maximals! I will be their Rancor!"

     He checked his maps, which were now working as they had time to adjust to the new planet, and started running towards the Decpticon base.

<P>Rancor:</P>

"Weapons," He said to himself, randomly, "I like weapons," He did a quick diagnostic of his weapons systems and came up with his spider legs, which doubled as machine guns in robot mode, an double bladed axe attached to his back, and electrified "webs" that could spear a bot and be pulled back into the back of his wrists.</P>
<P>     "I need a name!" He said. He looked himself over, "Hmmm.....I can be.....Rancor!" He laughed his high pitched laughter, "Yes, I will be the venom that kills Maximals! I will be their Rancor!"</P>
